title: Trials of Death
description: The trials: seventeen ways to die unless the luck of the vampire iswith you. Darren Shan must pass five fearsome Trials to prove himselfto the vampires clan - or face the stakes of the Hall of Death. ButVampire Mountain holds hidden threats. Sinister, potent forces aregathering in the darkness. In this nightmarish world of bloodshed andbetrayal, death may be a blessing...
author: Darren Shan
